cmake_add_all_subdirs()

cmake_py_library(
  NAME
    autophase
  SRCS
    "__init__.py"
  PUBLIC
)

cmake_cc_library(
  NAME
    InstCount
  COPTS
    "-DGOOGLE_PROTOBUF_NO_RTTI"
    "-fno-rtti"
  HDRS
    "InstCount.h"
  SRCS
    "InstCount.cc"
  DEPS
    unconverted_name:@llvm//10.0.0
  PUBLIC
)

source_group(
  compute_autophase-files
  FILES
    "compute-autophase"
    if(DARWIN NOT EQUAL TRUE)
      "libLLVMPolly"
    endif()
)
cmake_cc_binary(
  NAME
    compute_autophase-prelinked
  SRCS
    "compute_autophase.cc"
  COPTS
    "-DGOOGLE_PROTOBUF_NO_RTTI"
    "-fno-rtti"
  DEPS
    ::InstCount
    unconverted_name:@glog
    unconverted_name:@llvm//10.0.0
)

cmake_genrule(
  OUTS "compute_autophase"
  COMMAND
    if (DARWIN EQUAL TRUE)
      "cp ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/compute_autophase-prelinked $@"
    else()
      "cp ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/compute_autophase-prelinked $@ && " +
      "chmod 666 $@ && " +
      "patchelf --set-rpath '$$ORIGIN' $@ && " +
      "chmod 555 $@"
    endif()
  DEPENDS
    ::compiler_gym-llvm-service-prelinked
)

cmake_genrule(
  OUTS "libLLVMPolly.so"
  COMMAND
    "cp $$(dirname $(location @clang-llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-18.04//:clang))/../lib/LLVMPolly.so $@"
  DEPENDS
    "@clang-llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-18.04//:all_files"
    "@clang-llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-18.04//:clang"
)
